It clashes a bit with the overall style of the show. Same for some of The Office style humor they brought to this show. But these are minor things that don't get in the way of the story.\n\nDefinitely recommended. Give it a few episodes!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":65778,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007814/","name":"Hiam Abbass","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. Tensions rise as a bitter corporate battle threatens to turn into a family civil war."</script><metacontent="
Category: Drama|Drama
https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_QL75_UY281_CR18,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: It's a Free World...
programme.desc: Envoyée en Pologne, Angie recrute des travailleurs pour le compte d'une agence d'intérim britannique. Mais elle est brusquement licenciée pour avoir repoussé les avances d'un des directeurs. Avec son amie Rose, elle décide d'ouvrir sa propre agence de recrutement à Londres. Elle contacte des directeurs d'usines et des chefs de chantiers, s'engageant à leur fournir la main-d'oeuvre dont ils ont besoin.

programme.title: Moi, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Suite à une crise cardiaque, Daniel Blake, menuisier anglais presque sexagénaire, se retrouve dans l'impossibilité de reprendre son métier. Contredisant l’avis des médecins, une société privée, à laquelle l’administration sous-traite une partie de ses missions, le juge pourtant apte à travailler et le prive de la pension d’invalidité dont il pensait bénéficier. Désormais sans ressources, Daniel est obligé de s’inscrire au chômage. Il doit alors prouver à l'administration qu'il recherche activement un travail, sous peine de ne pas recevoir d'allocations.

programme.title: Anomalisa
programme.desc: Michael Stone, auteur anglais, arrive en avion à Cincinnati pour donner une conférence sur son dernier ouvrage, «Comment puis-je vous aider à les aider». En vol, il se souvient de la lettre pleine de ressentiment que sa petite amie Bella lui avait envoyé, juste après leur rupture onze ans plus tôt. Arrivé à l'hôtel, alors que le souvenir de Bella le hante, il décide de l'appeler. Son ancienne compagne accepte de le retrouver mais leur dîner ne se passe pas vraiment comme Michael l'aurait cru.

programme.title: Blue Valentine
programme.desc: Dean et Cindy se sont aimés dès qu'ils se sont vus. La jeune femme vivait alors une relation tumultueuse avec Bobby, son petit ami de l'époque. Dean a su la séduire et la réconforter. Des années plus tard, leur couple bat sérieusement de l'aile. Dean n'est plus que l'ombre de lui-même. Sa femme, qui le tenait en haute estime, se désole de son manque d'ambition au point qu'elle ne supporte plus sa présence.

programme.title: Court central
programme.sub-title: On verra bien si on se noie

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: A Berlin, en novembre 1989, l'espion James Gasciogne est tué par Youri Bakhtin, du KGB. A Londres, Lorraine Broughton, agente du MI-6, est chargée de se rendre à Berlin pour retrouver Bakhtin, désormais en possession d'une liste ultra-secrète d'agents. Sous l'identité d'Elisabeth Loyd, elle doit entrer en contact avec David Percival, un agent stationné à Berlin Est. A son arrivée, Lorraine est prise en charge par un chauffeur. Mais il s'agit d'un piège dont elle se sort de façon expéditive. Elle rencontre ensuite l'excentrique agent Percival.

programme.title: Truman Capote
programme.desc: En 1959. Truman Capote, 35 ans, est un écrivain très en vue de la côte Est des Etats-Unis : il brosse le portrait de personnalités pour le magazine «New Yorker» et sa nouvelle «Breakfast at Tiffany's» doit être adaptée au cinéma. Le 16 novembre, il apprend dans le «New York Times» qu'une famille de fermiers a été massacrée à Holcomb, au Kansas. Capote décide de s'y rendre pour interroger les habitants et tenter de comprendre ce meurtre.

programme.title: Et dehors ils embrassaient le silence
Late Night
programme.desc: Katherine Newbury, une présentatrice de talk show, est entourée d'auteurs masculins qu'elle tyrannise. Brad, son adjoint, lui conseille d'engager une plume féminine. Ce sera la positive Molly, d'origine indienne et dont l'unique expérience est d'écrire des blagues pour ses collègues d'un complexe chimique. Surnommée "huit" par sa nouvelle patronne, Molly fait ce qu'elle peut pour s'imposer. Entre-temps, la patronne de la chaîne annonce à Katherine qu'elle sera bientôt débarquée du show. Avec Molly et son équipe, celle-ci réussit à créer à nouveau le buzz autour de l'émission.

programme.title: Shrek 4 : il était une fin
programme.desc: Ayant regagné sa demeure avec femme et enfants, Shrek devrait être heureux. Mais il s'ennuie. Plus personne ne le craint. Lors de la fête d'anniversaire de ses enfants, les tensions s'accumulent pour l'ogre. Les trois petits cochons dévorent le gâteau. Shrek craque et finit par se mettre terriblement en colère. S'éloignant, il rencontre Tracassin, un sorcier qui lui propose un pacte. Contre une signature sur un contrat, il lui offre la possibilité de redevenir un véritable ogre. Shrek accepte… et se réveille dans un monde où plus personne ne le connaît !

programme.title: Né quelque part
programme.desc: Le père de Farid apprend qu'il est malade et demande à son fils de se rendre en Algérie pour sauver la maison familiale de la démolition. Le jeune homme, promis à une belle carrière d'avocat, n'a jamais mis les pieds en Algérie et accepte à contrecœur cette mission. Sur place, il fait la connaissance de son cousin et de ses amis. Tout bascule quand le cousin vole ses papiers pour partir en France. Farid se retrouve obligé de faire des démarches contraignantes pour faire renouveler ses papiers. En attendant, il est bloqué en Algérie.

programme.title: Grand Central
programme.desc: Drame.

programme.title: Sonic, le film
programme.desc: Sonic, un hérisson bleu qui court à une vitesse incroyable, est poursuivi dans les rues de San Francisco par le docteur Ivo Robotnik, un scientifique fou et moustachu. La créature se souvient alors de son enfance, sur une île très lointaine, protégé par le hibou Longclaw. C'est ce même Longclaw qui va envoyer Sonic sur Terre alors que sa vie est menacée par d'inquiétantes créatures. Dix années passent et le hérisson vit désormais dans la petite ville de Green Hillsl, en plein coeur du Montana, où il multiplie les records de vitesse sur les routes, intrigant le policier Tom Wachowski.

programme.title: Argo
programme.desc: En 1979, lors de la prise de l'ambassade américaine à Téhéran par les révolutionnaires iraniens, soixante Américains sont pris en otage. Mais, au beau lieu du chaos, six employés parviennent à s'échapper. Ils se réfugient au domicile de l'ambassadeur canadien. Tony Mendez, agent de la CIA spécialiste de l'exfiltration, tente de trouver un plan pour les sauver. Il a l'idée de faire passer les employés pour des techniciens de cinéma venus en repérage en Iran pour tourner un film de science-fiction. Ce thriller dramatique est inspiré de faits vécus.

programme.title: Night Call
programme.desc: A Los Angeles, Lou Bloom, criminel qui vit d'expédients, découvre le travail des cameramen, à la recherche d'images explosives. Il s'en procure une et décide de se mettre à son compte. Ses moyens et son matériel sont très limités et ses premiers essais sont hasardeux mais Lou persévère. Il veut se faire une place dans le métier et impressionner Nina Romina, directrice de l'information de Channel 6, une chaine de télévision locale.

programme.title: Les beaux jours
programme.desc: Dans une ville balnéaire du nord de la France. Caroline, dentiste à la retraite, accepte, un peu réticente, l'offre de ses enfants qui l'ont inscrite au club de loisirs pour seniors Les Beaux Jours où se rencontrent des gens de son âge pour exercer diverses activités. Après un premier contact difficile, elle finit par s'y rendre avec plaisir et y fait une belle rencontre. Caroline sympathise en effet avec Julien, qui lui donne des cours d'informatique. Le jeune homme devient bientôt son amant. A ses côtés, elle retrouve une joie de vivre toute spontanée.

programme.title: Le château de Cagliostro
programme.desc: Cambrioleur de renommée internationale, Edgar vient de réaliser le casse d'un casino. Mais il s'aperçoit que les billets qu'il a volés sont des faux. Il s'envole alors avec son compère Jigen pour le royaume de Cagliostro afin d'enquêter sur ce réseau de fausse monnaie. Sur place, ils viennent à la rescousse d'une jeune fille, pourchasée par des bandits. Il s'agit en fait de Clarisse, la princesse du royaume. Celle-ci doit bientôt être mariée contre son gré au sinistre comte de Cagliostro, qui règne sur le pays. Leur tentative échoue et Clarisse est bientôt enfermée dans le château du comte.

programme.title: Crazy, Stupid, Love
programme.desc: Comédie romantique.

programme.title: Jeux de pouvoir
programme.desc: Stephen Collins, jeune politicien ambitieux, est membre du Congrès, où il préside le comité de surveillance des dépenses de la Défense. Son assistante est tuée dans des circonstances mystérieuses. Cal McAffrey, journaliste et ami de longue date de Collins, est chargé par sa rédactrice en chef de mener une enquête. McAffrey découvre une affaire complexe où se mêlent politique et haute finance.

programme.title: Peur sur la base
programme.desc: Odessa Berken, adjudante-chef de la gendarmerie maritime, arrive sur la base navale de Brest pour une enquête. L'un des membres de l'unité des fusiliers, Yassin Rhaled a disparu. Le lendemain, le cadavre du vingtenaire est retrouvé au pied des falaises de la presqu'île de Crozon. L'autopsie révèle que le garçon a été assassiné. Sur le camp d'entraînement militaire, l'arrivée d'Odessa ne passe pas inaperçue : cette personne élégante a un caractère bien trempé. Ses premières investigations la conduisent vers un suspect... Nathan Berken, son frère.

programme.title: Une chance sur six
programme.desc: Dans le sud de la France, Hubert Vallon, un antiquaire homosexuel, partage sa vie avec Patricia de Sarneville, une riche héritière de quinze ans son aînée. Tandis qu'elle se consacre aux œuvres caritatives, Hubert préfère les œuvres d’art et les jeux de casino. Vallon rêve de se débarrasser de son épouse. Lorsqu'il fait la connaissance de Gaëtano Campanella, flic célibataire et catholique pratiquant, vivant chez sa mère, l'attraction est immédiate. Gaëtano applique son propre code moral. Aussi machiavéliques l'un que l'autre, les deux hommes ne vont pas tarder à s'affronter.

programme.title: Les heures sombres
programme.desc: Le 9 mai 1940, alors qu'Adolf Hitler a envahi la Tchécoslovaquie, la Pologne, le Danemark et la Norvège, trois millions de soldats allemands sont stationnés à la frontière belges, prêts à envahir le reste de l'Europe. En Angleterre, le Parlement a perdu confiance en Neville Chamberlain, qui cherchait à préserver la paix à n'importe quel prix, et doit lui trouver, très rapidement, un remplaçant. Un nom semble se démarquer, celui du conservateur Winston Churchill, aux positions radicalement opposées à celles de Chamberlain.

programme.title: Les grands esprits
programme.desc: François Foucault, agrégé de lettres, est un impitoyable professeur de français à Henri IV. Alors qu'il accompagne Pierre, son père, célèbre écrivain, à la présentation de son nouveau livre, il fait la connaissance de la séduisante Agathe Kaufman, qui travaille pour le ministère de l'éducation nationale. Pour l'impressionner, il affirme que les professeurs expérimentés devraient travailler dans les banlieues difficiles. Celle-ci le prend au mot et François se retrouve bientôt affecté pour un an dans un collège de banlieue parisienne.

programme.title: Imitation Game
programme.desc: A Manchester, au début des années 1950, à la suite d'un cambriolage, Alan Turing, brillant mathématicien, est interrogé par un policier. Il se souvient de sa jeunesse, dans l'Angleterre de 1939 et de la façon dont il a convaincu le commandant Denniston d'intégrer le programme de décryptage du code secret Enigma, utilisé par les Allemands pour communiquer. Avec quelques hommes, il travaille sous la direction du MI-6, département totalement secret. Mais son caractère solitaire complique ses relations avec ses condisciples.

programme.title: Life in a Year
programme.desc: Daryn est à une année charnière de sa vie. Très surveillé par son père Xavier, le jeune homme, en dernière année de lycée, se concentre sur ses études et candidate à Harvard. C'est en se rendant à un concert avec ses meilleurs amis Sammy et Kiran qu'il fait la connaissance d'Isabelle, très libre, en tout point différente de lui. Alors que Daryn est immédiatement séduit par Isabelle, la jeune femme, qui a plus conscience de ce qui les sépare, se montre plutôt distante. Pourtant, à force d'obstination, Daryn parvient à se rapprocher d'elle.

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: A Berlin, en novembre 1989, l'espion James Gasciogne est tué par Youri Bakhtin, du KGB. A Londres, Lorraine Broughton, agente du MI-6, est chargée de se rendre à Berlin pour retrouver Bakhtin, désormais en possession d'une liste ultra-secrète d'agents. Sous l'identité d'Elisabeth Loyd, elle doit entrer en contact avec David Percival, un agent stationné à Berlin Est. A son arrivée, Lorraine est prise en charge par un chauffeur. Mais il s'agit d'un piège dont elle se sort de façon expéditive. Elle rencontre ensuite l'excentrique agent Percival.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Les Bellas, une chorale a cappella de filles, viennent d'obtenir leur diplôme et rêvent d'un avenir prometteur, plein de belles opportunités. Mais les offres de travail sont peu nombreuses. Lors d'une soirée, Aubrey, la fille d'un militaire haut placé, parle aux autres membres du groupe d'un concert organisé en Espagne en soutien aux forces armées américaines. Sur place, les Bellas découvrent rapidement qu'elles sont en compétition avec trois autres formations musicales pour assurer la première partie de DJ Khaled lors de sa future tournée en Europe.

programme.title: Obama
programme.desc: Les deux mandats successifs de Barack Obama à la Maison Blanche sont émaillés de faits marquants comme le meurtre de Trayvon Martin ou la tuerie survenue dans une église à Charleston. Donald Trump a su capter les insatisfactions de la politique intérieure.

programme.title: L'élève Ducobu
programme.desc: Comédie.

programme.sub-title: S19 E1 Ma chair, mon sang

programme.title: Johnny Belle Gueule
programme.desc: Ironiquement surnommé Johnny belle gueule, John Sedley a un visage monstrueux. Un jour, il participe au hold-up d'une bijouterie et se fait arrêter. En prison, un chirurgien lui propose de lui refaire le visage.

programme.title: Le cousin
programme.desc: A Paris, à la fin des années 1990, l'inspecteur Maurin a préféré se suicider plutôt que de livrer à ses collègues Nounours, son indicateur. Ce dernier est un petit dealer au comportement violent et imprévisible. Gérard Delvaux, collègue de brigade et ami de Maurin, prend sa suite. Nounours devient aussi son informateur. Ensemble, ils tentent de piéger une bande de trafiquants de drogue.

programme.title: Code of a Killer
programme.desc: En 1983, le corps sans vie de Lynda Mann est retrouvé dans un sentier, près de Leicester, en Angleterre. Menée par l'inspecteur David Baker, l'enquête n'aboutit pas. A l'Université, le scientifique Alec Jeffreys développe une méthode pour lire le code génétique d'un individu. Trois ans plus tard, une adolescente, Dawn Ashworth, est portée disparue. Elle a été vue pour la dernière fois non loin du lieu où le cadavre de Lynda Mann avait été retrouvé.

programme.desc: ZeroZeroZero: Created by Leonardo Fasoli, Mauricio Katz, Stefano Sollima. With Andrea Riseborough, Dane DeHaan, Giuseppe De Domenico, Harold Torres. A cocaine shipment makes its way to Europe, starting from the moment a powerful cartel of Italian criminals decides to buy it, to its journeys through Mexico, to its shipment across the Atlantic Ocean." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8332438/","name":"ZeroZeroZero","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDAwOWI4MjMtMTJhMC00MjU4LTg4ZWUtZDExMzgzMzQ2NjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A cocaine shipment makes its way to Europe, starting from the moment a powerful cartel of Italian criminals decides to buy it, to its journeys through Mexico, to its shipment across the Atlantic Ocean.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8332438/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"chirox"},"dateCreated":"2020-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"10/10 One Of The Best","reviewBody":"Shows like this come along only once in a very long while. An American shipping magnate that has had to resort to concealing illegal shipments to help his ailing business, an Italian mafia family and Don that is looking to come out of hiding and reward everyone (including his enemies) with a huge payday, and a Mexican Army Elite Troop who's job it is to take down the Narcos. Combine these three elements, add extra intrigue, changing allegiances, amazing cinematography, settings on more than three continents, incredible tension building episodes and you have ZeroZeroZero. Ignore the naysayers on this site, this is one of the best shows you will see for a long time. Acting, photography, direction, are all first class. This is an incredible piece of TV that deserves to be up there with the very best.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21227,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-02-14","keywords":"cocaine,drug shipment,corrupt soldier,italian mafia,drugs","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2057859/","name":"Andrea Riseborough"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2851530/","name":"Dane DeHaan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9400978/","name":"Giuseppe De Domenico"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000415/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006938/","name":"Leonardo Fasoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1145589/","name":"Mauricio Katz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1356588/","name":"Stefano Sollima"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1818083097","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjlmMWNhNGUtOTk5Ni00NjdiLWFhMTEtYWFhYjdmMzQxMjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjlmMWNhNGUtOTk5Ni00NjdiLWFhMTEtYWFhYjdmMzQxMjZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on the book of the same name by bestselling author Roberto Saviano, ZeroZeroZero is an unforgettable exploration of the inner workings of the global cocaine trade. Coming to Prime Video March 6."}}</script><metacontent="

An American shipping magnate that has had to resort to concealing illegal shipments to help his ailing business, an Italian mafia family and Don that is looking to come out of hiding and reward everyone (including his enemies) with a huge payday, and a Mexican Army Elite Troop who's job it is to take down the Narcos. Combine these three elements, add extra intrigue, changing allegiances, amazing cinematography, settings on more than three continents, incredible tension building episodes and you have ZeroZeroZero. Ignore the naysayers on this site, this is one of the best shows you will see for a long time. Acting, photography, direction, are all first class. programme.title: Robert de Niro, Sr. – Eine Hommage
programme.desc: Robert De Niro Sr. war in den 40er und 50er Jahren ein anerkannter Maler in den USA. Peggy Guggenheim stellte seine Werke aus. Doch seine Karriere war nur von kurzer Dauer. Die Vertreter des abstrakten Expressionismus und der Pop-Art verdrängten die eher traditionellen Künstler wie Robert De Niro Sr. Sein Sohn, die Schauspieler-Ikone Robert De Niro, erinnert an seinen Vater und dessen Kunst.

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0118421, Title: Oz, --- Description: Oz: Created by Tom Fontana. With Ernie Hudson, J.K. Simmons, Lee Tergesen, Dean Winters. A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0118421/","name":"Oz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjY3N2M2YjgtZTFjZS00ODA1LWJjMDgtNDgxZDllZWFiMmYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A series chronicling the daily activities of an unusual prison facility and its criminal inhabitants.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118421/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cchase","dateCreated":"2000-02-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Do NOT pass go, do not travel down this "Yellow Brick Road"...","reviewBody":"...if what you want is the usual depiction that passes for prison life in a dramatic format. No SHAWSHANK REDEMPTION here, folks, no benevolent GREEN MILE guards or saintly supernatural inmates. OZ tells it like it is, and baby, it ain't pretty.

Using at times a sense of hyper-realism, (in the narrations of the excellent Harold Perrineau, who serves as the show's conscience and Greek chorus), OZ shows us both the profane and profound aspects of prison life that we good, law-abiding citizens don't like to think about. We have the "authorities" to take care of that, don't we?

Exceptional art, no matter what the medium, has the ability to move us, make us think, make us feel both things we embrace and things we reject. The power this show has to polarize viewers into two different camps--love it or hate it--is proof enough that Tom Fontana and Barry Levinson, the forces behind HOMICIDE: LIFE ON THE STREETS, have fashioned something we haven't seen the likes of in a very long time.

I would strongly suggest that anyone who has not yet seen it give it a try, if you have HBO. Then I dare you to tear yourself away from it. It's rare television that makes you sit up, take notice, and actually care about even the minor characters in an ensemble such as this, no matter how heinous their crimes, or how street-and-battle-hardened their exteriors.

Augustus Hill, Simon Adebisi, Tobias Beecher, Vern Schillinger, Chris Keller, Jefferson Keane, Ryan O'Reilly, Kareem Said, Nino Schibetta, Bob Rebadow, Tim McManus, Warden Leo Glynn, Sister Peter-Marie, Father Ray, Officer Diane Wittlesey and all the others will imprint themselves on your memory and stay there, until you can't wait to find out what happens next.

A blend of black humor and outright horror, cutting commentary and the basest brutality, it is one of the very few shows being done now that can reveal the most majestic qualities of the human spirit. The ongoing struggle to resist surrendering to impulses and urges that cause the evil that men do, in the one place you would least expect to find any light--in a sea of human misery and darkness.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":93779,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1997-07-12","keywords":"male rape,prison,italian,gay,aryan brotherhood","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001368/","name":"Ernie Hudson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. Simmons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0855564/","name":"Lee Tergesen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030480/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068745/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284956/","name":"Tom Fontana"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Oz: The Complete First Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2476671257","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBjMTgxOTQtNTYyYy00YWM2LWIzMmMtZGRkNDBjNmYyMmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTBjMTgxOTQtNTYyYy00YWM2LWIzMmMtZGRkNDBjNmYyMmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from HBO Home Video"</script><metacontent="

A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA2Mjk0N2MtNGY0Mi00ZWFjLTkxODEtZDFjNDg4ZDliMGVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gidget234","dateCreated":"2005-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"This show is G-O-O-D!","reviewBody":"The 2nd Season of "Greys Anatomy" has commenced and it is just as great as the 1st Season! This season the writers appear to be focusing on the development of the characters. They are finally giving Alex a soul by showing the inner turmoils he possesses which gives reason for his rude demeanor.

Similar to a lot of other shows, in my opinion, the supporting cast steal the show! Christina (Sandra Oh) is my favorite because her character is so complex and hilarious! It may also be because she is the comic relief, along with George (T.R Knight).

This show is great...and it just keeps getting better! Tune in! I highly recommend it! Grey's Anatomy has everything: drama, comedy, mystery, scandal and thrill.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276375,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-03-27","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2249007, Title: Ray Donovan, --- Description: Ray Donovan: Created by Ann Biderman. With Liev Schreiber, Eddie Marsan, Dash Mihok, Pooch Hall. Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2249007/","name":"Ray Donovan","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWY1MTE2MmItNzQyNi00YThjLWE4ZDctMDA0ZGE3OWJhYTMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTA3MTMyOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ray Donovan, a professional "fixer" for the rich and famous in Los Angeles, can make anyone's problems disappear except those created by his own family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2249007/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TakeUpReel","dateCreated":"2020-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Ray Donovan Drinking Game...","reviewBody":"Take a shot if a character says:


* What?
* Sure
* It doesn't matter
* Get in the car


If you really want to raise the stakes, take a half shot every time a character says:


* F. you
* Go F. yourself


You may want to have medical professionals standing by for the last two.

This show started off great. It got boring during the middle seasons, but season 6 was very good. I have mixed emotions about season 7. They provided a lot of interesting back story for a few characters, but they left a lot of loose threads at the end.

The whole series showed way too much of Ray's daughter. She got somewhat interesting in Season 6, but then I, once again, lost interest in her during season 7.

I'm glad Ray's son wasn't shown much during the last few seasons. He was an annoying character from the beginning.

Overall, it's a good show if you can stick with the boring bits.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80854,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-06-18","keywords":"female investigator,nudity,fixer,fbi agent,brother sister relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000630/","name":"Liev Schreiber","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0550371/","name":"Eddie Marsan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005231/","name":"Dash Mihok"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093837/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0081189/","name":"Ann Biderman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2778578713","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGVhY2M3OGYtYjRjOS00MmFjLWFlNTItOWFlOThlMmZjOTRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"While Ray makes personal progress, there are dangers that require the Ray Donovan of old. programme.title: Last Man Standing
Last Man Standing
programme.desc:
Last Man Standing: Directed by Walter Hill. With Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, William Sanderson, Christopher Walken. A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116830/","name":"Last Man Standing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThkYmJjYTMtOWMzNC00ZjQ4LWI4NzAtYjRlMDA3ZWMyYWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIyMjczNjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drifting gunslinger-for-hire finds himself in the middle of an ongoing war between the Irish and Italian mafia in a Prohibition era ghost town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116830/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wierzbowskisteedman"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unfairly trashed actioner from a master director","reviewBody":"Plot summary: In a prohibition era update of Yojimbo, Bruce Willis shoots a load of gangsters.

First off I will never understand why Walter Hill does not have a better reputation. He's probably best known for his commercial success with the 48 Hrs films, and his other brilliant features get criminally overlooked. He scored a cult hit with "The Warriors", he delivered one of the best westerns ever with "The Long Riders", and put all other car chase movies to shame with the ultra cool "The Driver." As anyone who has seen these films should realise, Hill should be mentioned in the same breath as Peckinpah, Woo and Rodriguez when it comes to slow-mo gunplay.

"Last Man Standing" doesn't rival these earlier works, but it is a tough, gritty film with some fantastic shootouts. It doesn't hold itself back in terms of blood and violence, something current US films of the genre are guilty of doing. It has everything an action film needs; tough antihero, loath able bad guys, a creepy main villain and plenty of cannon fodder. As long as you don't get hung up on technicalities (ie the guns fire ten times more ammo than they hold) you should be entertained.

It doesn't feel like any effort went into the screenplay, but Hill adds some nice touches to the film in terms of nods towards the source material. I particularly like the opening where Bruce spins his empty whisky bottle on the ground to decide which road to take; a clear reference to Toshiro Mifune throwing a stick into the air to decide on his path. There is also an interesting cast; there's earlier Hill collaborator Bruce Dern (The memorable villain from The Driver), William Sanderson (Blade Runner) and of course Christopher Walken, who chews the scenery talking tough with his hoarse accent and threatening people with a Tommy gun. His performance is really the most memorable thing about the film. Willis is not Mifune or Eastwood, but he does suit the mysterious drifter character well and this is one of his better action man roles.

All things said, the film certainly doesn't come close to "Yojimbo", but it does give the more rough hewn "Fistful of Dollars" a run for its money. By no means a masterpiece, "Last Man Standing" should still provide enough for any action fans tired of watered down mainstream Hollywood nonsense that currently dilutes cinemas. It is certainly a lot better than its reputation makes out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":56586,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1996-09-20","keywords":"mob violence,neo noir,gang warfare,bar shootout,1930s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Last Man Standing","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1435631897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRiMWM4NDctNjkxZS00MzVkLTg2YWItYTk3MTVmMTFiODY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRiMWM4NDctNjkxZS00MzVkLTg2YWItYTk3MTVmMTFiODY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Last Man Standing"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001136/","name":"Bruce Dern"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0761836/","name":"William Sanderson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001353/","name":"Walter Hill"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0452878/","name":"Ryûzô Kikushima"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000041/","name":"Akira Kurosawa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001353/","name":"Walter Hill"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

First off I will never understand why Walter Hill does not have a better reputation. He's probably best known for his commercial success with the 48 Hrs films, and his other brilliant features get criminally overlooked. He scored a cult hit with "The Warriors", he delivered one of the best westerns ever with "The Long Riders", and put all other car chase movies to shame with the ultra cool "The Driver." As anyone who has seen these films should realise, Hill should be mentioned in the same breath as Peckinpah, Woo and Rodriguez when it comes to slow-mo gunplay.

"Last Man Standing" doesn't rival these earlier works, but it is a tough, gritty film with some fantastic shootouts. It doesn't hold itself back in terms of blood and violence, something current US films of the genre are guilty of doing. It has everything an action film needs; tough antihero, loath able bad guys, a creepy main villain and plenty of cannon fodder. As long as you don't get hung up on technicalities (ie the guns fire ten times more ammo than they hold) you should be entertained.

It doesn't feel like any effort went into the screenplay, but Hill adds some nice touches to the film in terms of nods towards the source material. I particularly like the opening where Bruce spins his empty whisky bottle on the ground to decide which road to take; a clear reference to Toshiro Mifune throwing a stick into the air to decide on his path. There is also an interesting cast; there's earlier Hill collaborator Bruce Dern (The memorable villain from The Driver), William Sanderson (Blade Runner) and of course Christopher Walken, who chews the scenery talking tough with his hoarse accent and threatening people with a Tommy gun. His performance is really the most memorable thing about the film. Willis is not Mifune or Eastwood, but he does suit the mysterious drifter character well and this is one of his better action man roles.

All things said, the film certainly doesn't come close to "Yojimbo", but it does give the more rough hewn "Fistful of Dollars" a run for its money. By no means a masterpiece, "Last Man Standing" should still provide enough for any action fans tired of watered down mainstream Hollywood nonsense that currently dilutes cinemas. programme.title: X: First Class
X-Men: Erste Entscheidung
programme.desc:
X: First Class: Directed by Matthew Vaughn. With James McAvoy, Laurence Belcher, Michael Fassbender, Bill Milner. In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1270798/","name":"X: First Class","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5OTMxNzk4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk1MjAwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1270798/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jacobmounter"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Xmen film yet!","reviewBody":"Xmen: First Class is simply fantastic. Strong emotion and explosive action. The acting is top notch. Delivery from every actor is at it's best, more so from Mystique, Beast, Xavier and Magneto. 

The story is more character based than action, however the action sequences are still superb. Personally i'd have liked to of seen it being a 15 and have a more adult but it wasn't a big issue. Also some more background story from the bad super's would have been good but again this wasn't too much of an issue and would leave some nice room for upcoming xmen movies. 

I don't want to say too much but to break it down... Go see this film no matter what you are into. There is something for everyone. 9/10 easy","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":664755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-01","keywords":"professor charles xavier character,wolverine character,vigilante,magneto character,shapeshifter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"X-Men: First Class - Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi168926489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4MDIyNDQ1MjleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY5Nzc5MDU@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4MDIyNDQ1MjleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY5Nzc5MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"X-Men: First Class unveils the epic beginning of the X-Men saga Â– and a secret history of the Cold War and our world at the brink of nuclear Armageddon. programme.title: Greenland
Greenland
programme.desc: Greenland: Directed by Ric Roman Waugh. With Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, Roger Dale Floyd, Scott Glenn. A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7737786/","name":"Greenland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzcyMzU4MDUtM2JhOC00ZDg2LTg5MGMtZjc2OGMyMjhlMGE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7737786/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what I was expecting, but it unexpectedly worked.","reviewBody":"If you're going into this expecting some high-stakes thrills and excitement with mind-blowing action and effect, you'll probably be disappointed, because that's what we've all become accustomed in these type of films. But in an unexpected and refreshing change, writer Chris Sparling made this story more about family dynamics and humanities quest for survival during an extinction-level disaster. This felt less Hollywood-ish, and more realistic than I expected, and that's a good thing. Director Ric Roman Waugh did a great job putting together Sparling's script. The 119 min runtime was just right, as was the pacing. The score was decent, but felt a little overbearing in some scenes. The casting was good, with Butler delivering as usual, but Morena Baccarin seemed bland in most of the film, and her constant side view during the car ride highlighting her terrible nose job was annoying. The score was decent, although overbearing in some scenes. I was disappointed with the 1990's CGI effects especially having a 35M budget. Nevertheless, a fun and enjoyable ride, and a solid 8/10 from me."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100837,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-12-18","keywords":"natural disaster,looting,greenland,apocalypse,disaster film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2720317721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk1MzdlZTktMzc1Yi00YmQxLTgyMzctM2JkM2U4Mzc0OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk1MzdlZTktMzc1Yi00YmQxLTgyMzctM2JkM2U4Mzc0OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9819444/","name":"Roger Dale Floyd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006846/","name":"Ric Roman Waugh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0699213/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0413801/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2133655/","name":"Chris Sparling"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
Todeszug nach Yuma
programme.desc:
3:10 to Yuma: Directed by James Mangold. With Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Logan Lerman, Dallas Roberts. A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381849/","name":"3:10 to Yuma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE0NTcxNTQzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzczOTIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381849/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Modern Classic","reviewBody":"This is the best western since Unforgiven. Every aspect of this film is great. 

The acting was superb. Russell Crowe continues to give great and much overlooked performances. He delivers a great performance as outlaw Ben Wade. Crowe just keeps on putting me in shock with his spectacular performances. Crowe brought a mystique to his role that would of fit in with the old westerns. He seems as if he play anything and was a joy to watch here. He needs to be given much more and was definitely worthy of an Oscar nomination. Christain Bale also gives as a surprise to me a great performance as Dan Evans. He is on the verge of losing everything he's got. Bale displays his desperation and his willingness to feel that he has a purpose in life. He is definitely turning into a very good all around actor. I think he also deserved an Oscar nomination. Peter Fonda and Ben Foster also give very solid performances in their supporting roles. 

I have heard some people say that this western was to talky but I don't believe so. I think this was filled with great dialog and was engaging for the length of the movie.

The directing by James Mangold was probably the best I have seen from him. He was able to bring back the old western style but yet mix it together with a modern effects and etc. He did not fall into the trap of making it boring or to violent. He carried the movie all the way through keeping the viewer entertained. The cinematography was amazing. The sceneries were spectacular and many of the shooting scenes were delivered with such excellence with the acting, directing but the cinematography brought those scenes and this movie to another level. The music was great as well. It did not become cliché but instead made you feel like you were back watching Clint Eastwood, Gary Cooper or John Wayne. It just captured me like no other western has in a while. 

This movie is truly a modern classic.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":298577,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-12","keywords":"outlaw,arizona territory,based on short story,outlaw gang,contention city arizona","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"3:10 to Yuma","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2880504089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MTYxNzUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzMjYy._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MTYxNzUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzMjYy._V1_.jpg","description":"3:10 to Yuma - Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004936/","name":"Ben Foster"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131022/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919925/","name":"Halsted Welles"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Trauma Center
Trauma Center
programme.desc: Trauma Center: Directed by Matt Eskandari. With Nicky Whelan, Bruce Willis, Tito Ortiz, Texas Battle. Alone and trapped in a locked-down hospital, an injured young woman must escape a pair of vicious killers who are after the only piece of evidence that can implicate them in a grisly murder, the bullet in her leg." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9625664/","name":"Trauma Center","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTRkNWM1MmEtZDYzOC00NWI2LTljYzctYWIwYTdjYWNjYTMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alone and trapped in a locked-down hospital, an injured young woman must escape a pair of vicious killers who are after the only piece of evidence that can implicate them in a grisly murder, the bullet in her leg.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9625664/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mary-179-677383"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Okay movie","reviewBody":"Okay movie. The female lead Madison was great. Her acting was great, the things she did in the movie were smart and believable so her character was written well. The actor who played pierce however was weak. Tulls portrayed a believable dirty cop. Bruce Willis man this is hard to write bc I am a true fan, but he slurred his words and appeared drunk in most of his scenes. Unfortunately this movie is only 5/10 bc it has a weak storyline (dirty cops shoot good cops with their police gun) so the bad guys were a bit too dumb. They should have added 10 more mins to the film to give it more background/depth and it could have been a great movie. It's still worth watching. I was entertained throughout and actually watched the whole thing without getting distracted. Better than most Netflix films.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12783,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-12-06","keywords":"murder,protector,trauma,hospital,asthma","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trauma Center","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4263493401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzIzZmZkZGEtMjA3My00NDA5LTk5NjUtOTcyMzIwYjgzNzAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzIzZmZkZGEtMjA3My00NDA5LTk5NjUtOTcyMzIwYjgzNzAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1764351/","name":"Nicky Whelan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0651274/","name":"Tito Ortiz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1760759/","name":"Matt Eskandari"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0291239/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2632776/","name":"Paul Da Silva"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
The Doorman: Directed by Ryûhei Kitamura. With Ruby Rose, Jean Reno, Aksel Hennie, Rupert Evans. A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. A gang of thieves plot to take the family's valuables, and she is all that stands between them and their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6222118/","name":"The Doorman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzEwYTQ0NWYtZTVjYS00NGNlLWIwMDctYjA3MDQ4OWNiYjMxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman returns from combat and befriends a family in NYC. As it goes on though, it starts to fall apart.

X-Men: Erste Entscheidung
programme.desc:
X: First Class: Directed by Matthew Vaughn. With James McAvoy, Laurence Belcher, Michael Fassbender, Bill Milner. In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1270798/","name":"X: First Class","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5OTMxNzk4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTk1MjAwNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1270798/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jacobmounter"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Best Xmen film yet!","reviewBody":"Xmen: First Class is simply fantastic. Strong emotion and explosive action. The acting is top notch. Delivery from every actor is at it's best, more so from Mystique, Beast, Xavier and Magneto. 

The story is more character based than action, however the action sequences are still superb. Personally i'd have liked to of seen it being a 15 and have a more adult but it wasn't a big issue. Also some more background story from the bad super's would have been good but again this wasn't too much of an issue and would leave some nice room for upcoming xmen movies. 

I don't want to say too much but to break it down... Go see this film no matter what you are into. There is something for everyone. 9/10 easy","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":664755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-01","keywords":"professor charles xavier character,wolverine character,vigilante,magneto character,shapeshifter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"X-Men: First Class - Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi168926489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4MDIyNDQ1MjleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY5Nzc5MDU@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4MDIyNDQ1MjleQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDY5Nzc5MDU@._V1_.jpg","description":"X-Men: First Class unveils the epic beginning of the X-Men saga Â– and a secret history of the Cold War and our world at the brink of nuclear Armageddon. programme.desc: Greenland: Directed by Ric Roman Waugh. With Gerard Butler, Morena Baccarin, Roger Dale Floyd, Scott Glenn. A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7737786/","name":"Greenland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzcyMzU4MDUtM2JhOC00ZDg2LTg5MGMtZjc2OGMyMjhlMGE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7737786/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Top_Dawg_Critic"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what I was expecting, but it unexpectedly worked.","reviewBody":"If you're going into this expecting some high-stakes thrills and excitement with mind-blowing action and effect, you'll probably be disappointed, because that's what we've all become accustomed in these type of films. But in an unexpected and refreshing change, writer Chris Sparling made this story more about family dynamics and humanities quest for survival during an extinction-level disaster. This felt less Hollywood-ish, and more realistic than I expected, and that's a good thing. Director Ric Roman Waugh did a great job putting together Sparling's script. The 119 min runtime was just right, as was the pacing. The score was decent, but felt a little overbearing in some scenes. The casting was good, with Butler delivering as usual, but Morena Baccarin seemed bland in most of the film, and her constant side view during the car ride highlighting her terrible nose job was annoying. The score was decent, although overbearing in some scenes. I was disappointed with the 1990's CGI effects especially having a 35M budget. Nevertheless, a fun and enjoyable ride, and a solid 8/10 from me."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":100837,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-12-18","keywords":"natural disaster,looting,greenland,apocalypse,disaster film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2720317721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk1MzdlZTktMzc1Yi00YmQxLTgyMzctM2JkM2U4Mzc0OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk1MzdlZTktMzc1Yi00YmQxLTgyMzctM2JkM2U4Mzc0OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9819444/","name":"Roger Dale Floyd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006846/","name":"Ric Roman Waugh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0699213/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0413801/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2133655/","name":"Chris Sparling"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Non-Stop
Non-Stop
programme.desc:
Non-Stop: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra. With Liam Neeson, Julianne Moore, Scoot McNairy, Michelle Dockery. An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages demanding $150 million into an off-shore account, or someone will die every 20 minutes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2024469/","name":"Non-Stop","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTI3NzcxMjkzMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY0NTQ0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages demanding $150 million into an off-shore account, or someone will die every 20 minutes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2024469/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"statuskuo"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Keeps You Guessing","reviewBody":"This surprised me. A thriller on a plane that has you thinking you know all the answers (because we're such expert movie watches), then flips it. Yes, it's a contrived subplot. And the reasoning behind this terrorist act is goofy, BUT...it is a lot of fun. It interweaves a really elaborate set-up that you have to focus on to understand.

Also, for people who think they're sophisticated in camera motion. Think about that space. The camera moves in (perceived) 360 degrees without a) seeing camera shadow b) camera angle is near impossible with the movements they had. This is visually sophistication that most won't see or care. But it adds a ton to the claustrophobia.

Julianne Moore is great, as always. Neeson is perfect for this role, but one has to wonder how this behemoth of a guy fits in a airplane bathroom.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":257478,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-02-26","keywords":"die hard scenario,passenger,mind game,deception,suspense","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1005889561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5NzE5OTMxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUxMjU0MDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5NzE5OTMxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUxMjU0MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"During a transatlantic flight from New York City to London, U.S. Air Marshal Bill Marks receives a series of cryptic text messages demanding that he instruct the airline to transfer $150 million into an off-shore account. Until he secures the money, a passenger on his flight will be killed every 20 minutes. programme.title: Unknown
Unknown Identity
programme.desc: Unknown: Directed by Jaume Collet-Serra. With Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger, January Jones, Aidan Quinn. When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1401152/","name":"Unknown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODA4NTk3MTQwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjUwMTMxNA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a man awakens from a coma only to discover that someone has taken on his identity, he teams up with a young woman to prove who he is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1401152/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BeneCumb"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"An elegant thriller, with several unpredictable twists","reviewBody":"This century has seen Liam Neeson in real leading roles, when his character "permeates" the whole movie and is strong and quick-witted. Taken 1 and 2 are best known, Unknown has - for some reason or another - remained in their shadow. In my opinion, the script of the latter is much stronger, has more twists-turns and unpredictable moments - me being a fan and active viewer of crime thrillers could not guess what kind of background could Neeson's character Dr. Martin Harris really have. Sequence of the events is logical and chases are visually enjoyable. The ending in general is predictable, apart from the very last scene.\n\nWell, all the cast is excellent, not only Liam Neeson; Diane Kruger and Bruno Ganz are the supporting actors more time on screen and they are really good. In short, Unknown is really worth watching - especially if you have not read spoilers :)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":256017,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2011-03-23","keywords":"amnesia,coma,airport,scientist,nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Unknown: International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1552980505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTA4NjYwMDYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1NTgyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1208167/","name":"Diane Kruger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005064/","name":"January Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429471/","name":"Jaume Collet-Serra"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050870/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124700/","name":"Oliver Butcher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0180508/","name":"Stephen Cornwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885857/","name":"Didier Van Cauwelaert"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chaos
Chaos
programme.desc:
Chaos: Directed by Tony Giglio. With Jason Statham, Ryan Phillippe, Wesley Snipes, Henry Czerny. Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0402910/","name":"Chaos","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NDU0MTgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgwMzY4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0402910/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cryptkeeperboy"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too much chaos","reviewBody":"Let's be fair, it's a good movie BUT it's hardly memorable or spectacular in the long term. I think what the director thought was... "people like smart action movies, therefore i'll make mine smart". Well here's the difference you have action movies that don't look that smart but actually are. And this one looks smart but actually isn't. The problem with that is that it tries to outdo itself, especially the last thirty minutes... where the detective comes upon a different plot every ten minutes, so what we get then is a Usual Suspects kinda montage of every far fetched clue we overlooked only to be changed entirely ten minutes later up until a point were you stop caring.

The director/writer will have to explain to me how detectives take a mathematical theory seriously as a tool to outsmart cops. Again maybe the director wanted to be smart again, by namedropping it's plot by defining it with some fancy word.

Anyway i didn't think much of Jason Statham's acting at all, he's kinda like the Orlando Bloom of the action movies... luckily he doesn't carry this movie alone (unlike The Transporter). Wesley Snipes' character is typical Snipes, after starring in numerous action movies i suppose it was a walk in the park for him. And Ryan Philliphe is a very promising upcoming actor, he really delivers probably the best acting (along with Snipes) in the entire movie.

Just see it once and you'll be entertained. IMDb data; ttnr: 0402910, Title: Chaos, --- Description: Chaos: Directed by Tony Giglio. With Jason Statham, Ryan Phillippe, Wesley Snipes, Henry Czerny. Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0402910/","name":"Chaos","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NDU0MTgyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgwMzY4NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0402910/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cryptkeeperboy","dateCreated":"2006-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too much chaos","reviewBody":"Let's be fair, it's a good movie BUT it's hardly memorable or spectacular in the long term. I think what the director thought was... "people like smart action movies, therefore i'll make mine smart". Well here's the difference you have action movies that don't look that smart but actually are. And this one looks smart but actually isn't. The problem with that is that it tries to outdo itself, especially the last thirty minutes... where the detective comes upon a different plot every ten minutes, so what we get then is a Usual Suspects kinda montage of every far fetched clue we overlooked only to be changed entirely ten minutes later up until a point were you stop caring.

The director/writer will have to explain to me how detectives take a mathematical theory seriously as a tool to outsmart cops. Again maybe the director wanted to be smart again, by namedropping it's plot by defining it with some fancy word.

Anyway i didn't think much of Jason Statham's acting at all, he's kinda like the Orlando Bloom of the action movies... luckily he doesn't carry this movie alone (unlike The Transporter). Wesley Snipes' character is typical Snipes, after starring in numerous action movies i suppose it was a walk in the park for him. And Ryan Philliphe is a very promising upcoming actor, he really delivers probably the best acting (along with Snipes) in the entire movie.

Just see it once and you'll be entertained. Just don't try to think much about the plot after worths or you'll be insulted.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":53592,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2006-11-08","keywords":"chaos theory,power outage,investigation,exploding house,hanging upside down","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000202/","name":"Ryan Phillippe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000648/","name":"Wesley Snipes"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317638/","name":"Tony Giglio"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125996/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0313720/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0313752/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317638/","name":"Tony Giglio"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Becky
Becky
programme.desc:
Becky: Directed by Jonathan Milott, Cary Murnion. With Lulu Wilson, Kevin James, Joel McHale, Robert Maillet. A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10314450/","name":"Becky","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTlhYThkYjItZDdmYi00ZGRhLTg1OTAtMDRhZTM5ZWI5NGZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA0MDk5Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A teenager's weekend at a lake house with her father takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts wreaks havoc on their lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10314450/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tresm87"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Usual funnyman Kevin James is intriguing in this cliche villainous role, however the film itself is just an excuse for cheap revenge/bloodshed without much plot.","reviewBody":"I think almost everyone enjoys to see a comedian break away from the laughs and turn serious for a role, or in this case even villainous. Kevin James executes this extremely played out and cliche Aryan brotherhood/supremacist/convict character as well as he could've with what barren script he was given.

Everything starts out with some solid character development with the young Lulu Wilson with her struggles and current emotional situation. As things progress we fly ahead into the start of the action and are introduced to the ever cliche written group of villains with intensity and mystery. At this point it appears as though they will explain a certain plot device in which the antagonists are after, but they fail to do so. Then things start getting gruesome and very fast paced and you still wonder what they are truly after. Towards the final act just when you think they'll explain what the point of all this was, we are once again left hanging without any true explanation of their intentions with the main object they were after rendering the whole story nearly useless other than for extreme brutality and revenge empowerment.

As I mentioned the film has some decently entertaining performances by James and Wilson, and some solid production value, but there is almost no story here. If they would've simply given an explanation to the motives of these convicts and wrapped up some loose ends, it could've been slightly better. Instead it just feels like a hollow and cliche revenge thriller.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14812,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-06-05","keywords":"teenager kills adult,home invasion,father daughter relationship,key,fiance fiancee relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1658306073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODJhNmUxODYtYTM3Yy00YTYzLTljMDUtNjNhY2U3Njc2MDUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODJhNmUxODYtYTM3Yy00YTYzLTljMDUtNjNhY2U3Njc2MDUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"Spunky and rebellious, Becky (Lulu Wilson) is brought to a weekend getaway at a lake house by her father Jeff (Joel McHale) in an effort to try to reconnect. The trip immediately takes a turn for the worse when a group of convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick (Kevin James), suddenly invade the lake house."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5157662/","name":"Lulu Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0416673/","name":"Kevin James"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0570364/","name":"Joel McHale"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5732579/","name":"Jonathan Milott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5722382/","name":"Cary Murnion"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303286/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0378412/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10686634/","name":"Nick Morris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1460195/","name":"Ruckus Skye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1864206/","name":"Lane Skye"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Ying: Directed by Yimou Zhang. With Chao Deng, Li Sun, Ryan Zheng, Qianyuan Wang. Life and intrigue in an ancient Chinese court." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6864046/","name":"Ying","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWFjODJjZTMtOGYwMy00ZWYzLThjZWMtOTAxOTJmMTJhN2QzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life and intrigue in an ancient Chinese court.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6864046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"shaneandtash"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shades of complexity","reviewBody":"What a visually stunning movie! Be drawn in to a land of different shade and shadows - with motives that are equally dark. If you enjoy Asian cinema then this multi-layered feast is for you. Sacrifice, struggle and salvation are captured in their many tones. Visual metaphors and the yin-yang concept are explored in ways you've never seen before. Sumptuous costuming and intricately created sets combine to sweep you up in this complex drama. Whilst the first third is a bit slow, hang in there and be rewarded with an amazing final act. You will never look at umbrellas in the same way again!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14459,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-09-30","keywords":"king,training,underwater scene,umbrella,blood","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1197849881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ0ZDBlZDgtM2E5MS00N2U5LTk2MmEtN2UxYmM5YTA2OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzQ0ZDBlZDgtM2E5MS00N2U5LTk2MmEtN2UxYmM5YTA2OTI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a kingdom ruled by a young and unpredictable king, the military commander has a secret weapon: a "shadow," a look-alike who can fool both his enemies and the King himself.
